FAQ_DATA.title: What will my clients think?
FAQ_DATA.description: Quotes from clients: 'Watching videos of your candidates is incredibly helpful for making a decision on next steps', 'Wow, this is amazing. I love the way you are presenting candidates'

FAQ_DATA.title: What will my candidates think?
FAQ_DATA.description: Quotes from candidates: 'The software was wonderful and I enjoyed it immensely.',   'The one way video interview went great! I loved to be able to re-record/review video before submitting it. REALLY helpful',     'Very simple and easy to use'

FAQ_DATA.title: What support do I get?
FAQ_DATA.description: All of our plans come with 24/7 support with a real human. Click the blue button on the bottom right and say hello!

FAQ_DATA.title: What if I'm not sure if this is for me?
FAQ_DATA.description: That is OK! We would still be more than happy to demo with you to see if there might be a fit. At the very least, you will walk away knowing better ways to present your candidates and make placements.

FEATURES.title: Beautiful Presentations
FEATURES.description: The best way to present your candidate information. Show their resume, writeup, video interview, and any other docs you have all in one place.

FEATURES.title: Full Client Analytics
FEATURES.description: See everything your client does. Get notified when they view your candidates so you can follow up in real-time.

FEATURES.title: Personalized Branding
FEATURES.description: Strengthen your company brand by using your own branding on your candidate presentations.

FEATURES.title: Simple
FEATURES.description: Simple for your clients, simple for you, simple for candidates. Clients can view your candidates at the click of a button.

FEATURES.title: One-Click-Interview
FEATURES.description: The absoloute easiest way to get videos of your candidates. They click on a link, and can immediatly record their responses no matter the device or browser.

FEATURES.title: Customer Support
FEATURES.description: Full support for both you, and your candidates. Additionally, you will get a dedicated Success coach to make sure you succeed.

TESTIMONIALS.title: My Clients love DeepHire
TESTIMONIALS.review: DeepHire has made a world of difference in my business. My clients love recieving the DeepHire shortlist, and I can tell they watch the videos as soon as I send over a candidate. Before we used DeepHire, it was difficult to get feedback from our clients about the candidates.
TESTIMONIALS.name: Aron Hilgust

TESTIMONIALS.title: DeepHire took me to the next level
TESTIMONIALS.review: To be honest, I was a little unsure about the software at the beginning, but after starting, the results were amazing! My clients love being able to see the videos of the candidates, and it speeds up their decision making process. When my clients have a new role, they always reach out to me first now.
TESTIMONIALS.name: Matt Arching

TESTIMONIALS.title: DeepHire helped me double my placement rate
TESTIMONIALS.review: I can not express enough how valuable DeepHire has been. Since I started using Deephire, my placement rate has doubled. My clients & candidates view me as innovative, and keep doing repeat business with me. My candidates say they like the tool as well. It's so simple!
TESTIMONIALS.name: Petra Cristiana
